New Records: The Padres became the first team in MLB postseason history to get six consecutive hits and hit for the cycle in the same inning.
Key Match Events: Kyle Higashioka's game-tying solo home run
Luis Arraez, Fernando Tatis Jr. and Jurickson Profar's three consecutive singles
Post-Match Reflections: The Padres swept the Braves out of the postseason
The Padres advanced to an NLDS matchup with the Los Angeles Dodgers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Max Fried was removed from the game due to a hip injury
The Braves managed only one run in the fifth inning
